name: Bong (NOT PONG)
description:
lol i made pong in 3d but made it so that you can play single and multiplayer (same keyboard) :P

Controls:

WS for blue, Up and Down for red

Space to pause, Escape to Unpause

Reach 25 points to win for singleplayer, First to reach 20 points wins in multiplayer

Once game is won, press "Back to Start" then in Start menu click "Reset Stats" and play again :)

If ball goes in straight line back and forth or something goes wrong, pause and go back to start menu then play again and it will restart but you will keep your score from last time

Leave your thoughts, suggestions for the game, or stuff that could be fixed  in the comments it is appreciated :)
